email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Hope you're doing well. We have a vessel available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao.

Details:
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Incoterm: CIF
- Vessel: OCEAN TITAN
- Freight Quote: USD 22.50 per MT
- Laycan: 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, is there any flexibility on the freight rate?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Freight Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

OCEAN TITAN has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. Given the current market conditions, we can adjust the freight rate to USD 21.75 per MT.

Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the revised rate. We are looking at a laytime start date of 2023-10-20. Can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 20,000 per day is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Alex
